subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Maybe there is only one box user allowed!?
author: Lisby
full_text:
On Dec 3, 2007, at 9:34 PM, judy_in_hollywood wrote:

>
>  Hi All, What's to keep Chris from getting a Patent of his own on  
> HIS "Telephone to The Dead"? Does Frank have his "Franks Box"  
> Patented by the U.S. Patent Offices (the cost is low for this,  
> BTW)???? I think it has merit thus far, for Frank to consider a  
> Lawsuit! So what if it was a gift, Frank stated it was to be used  
> in 1 place (statonary) & for testing purposes ONLY. What Chris has  
> done with it, is Run with it making several businesses with it and  
> making a profit from it . . . . this is NOT what Frank intended HIS  
> Box(es) to be used as! =Judy=
>

There is nothing to stop Frank from trying to patent it, if he so  
chooses. But it's his choice.

Neither I, nor you, know the details that passed between Chris and  
Frank. Only they could testify to it. It would be a case of he/he  
said. And what good would it serve anyone? We're back to the bull  
crap of the Edison v. Tesla Gangs.

This line of conversation needs to ends, HMO.

Ann
